channel.title: Handcannon how to make it fire 508 bulby
channel.description:
hiya guys
i am trying on mi bulby source to get my handcannon to fire. when i attack something with it , it disappers and just punches. All i want is it to fire but use no arrows/cannon balls . (range weapon). Also if possible i would like it to use this gfx when it fires "542" if any could do mi like a mini tut wid the codes done and telling me what to do i would appreciate it alot! :) White merlin :) P.S. who ever can do it will get a 100% rep++ and if i open my server (prob i will) you will get handcannon(rare) and dungoneering 99 and the skill cape (finshing the dungoneering this week!)
